MemeDef.label: trader
MemeDef.description: To trade one thing for another, that's the essence of life.

rulesStrings.li: episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->[deity0_name] Showed us how to trade and exchange with one another.
intro(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [memberNamePlural] [revelationAdverb], teaching them the secrets of trade, along with it's true meaning.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->A [place_job] named [founderName] was blessed by [deity0_name], becoming the best merchant that ever existed.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->[founderName] Showed those with little left the art of trade, seding them into an age of prosperity.
lesson(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->trading is something that happens everywhere, both in human society and nature
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->If you are good at trading, there' little you can't get.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->In the begining, the spirits and the earth were separated. Only through trading did they become one.
animistFact(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->Spirits trade energies with one another, just like we humans trade our belongings.
